events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and are excited to review your qualifications and experience in software development.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your background in software engineering and relevant skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process and answer any questions you may have.
We conducted the initial screening call to discuss your experience in software development and confirm your interest in the engineering position.
Thank you for the positive feedback during the screening. You expressed strong enthusiasm about the role and your background aligns well with our expectations.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our engineering lead to further assess your skills in software development and problem-solving.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and a solid understanding of software engineering principles.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your career goals, cultural fit, and overall motivation for joining the engineering team.
The HR interview went well; you communicated your values clearly and showed enthusiasm for our company culture.
An offer has been proposed to you for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits based on your experience.
We received your positive feedback on the offer, expressing excitement about the opportunity and the terms presented.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started, including introductions to the team and setup of all necessary engineering tools and accounts.
The hiring process is now officially closed. You are successfully integrated into the engineering team and ready to contribute.
